heading: "Changes to making a referral"

heading: "Changes to ETE interventions"
link_text: ETE referrals can only be made in Greater Manchester."

heading: "Get better information about sessions"
text: "You can now get more information about the SAA and delivery sessions..."

heading: "Helping to reduce your emails"
text: "Service providers can now add a case note without it sending you an email."
